title: Uko Tugera Ku Isi Hose
subtitle: Umuyoboro wacu ugera mu bihugu {{count}} ku migabane itandukanye, uhuza ubuhanga butandukanye kugira ngo duhindure uburezi mu Rwanda.

headquarters.title: Ibiro Bikuru Biri mu Rwanda
headquarters.description: Ibiro byacu bikuru biri kuri Kigali Alliance Business Center, Kigali, Rwanda - mu mutima w’akarere k’ikoranabuhanga gatera imbere vuba muri Afurika. Uhereye hano, duhuza abafatanyabikorwa bacu ku isi hose kugira ngo dutange ingaruka nziza ku burezi bw’abana.
